alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kershaw; Lexington; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington, northwestern Sumter, eastern Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elgin to near Gaston. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, Dentsville, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Villages at Sandhill, Elgin, Horrel Hill, SC State Farmer`s Market, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Sandy Run, Fort Jackson, Lugoff, Fort Jackson Wildcat Road and Cayce Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 75 and 92. Interstate 26 between mile markers 117 and 133. Interstate 77 between mile markers 2 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
